work.summary: Developed a forecasting tool using Python and statistical methods to predict rental demand, increasing decision-making accuracy by 20%. Led a multidisciplinary team, ensuring project delivery on time and 17% under budget. Generated an ROI of 2,126%, delivering $217,212 in value from an investment of $9,760. Integrated data analysis and visualization techniques using Python and Google Colab, providing real-time insights on rental trends.

work.company: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
work.position: MEMS Engineer - MEMS Fabricated Continuous Sweat Glucose Monitor
work.summary: Engineered a MEMS-fabricated, glucose sweat sensor, improving lifespan by 700% over commercial models. Simulated sensor behavior using COMSOL Multiphysics. Experimented with techniques like photolithography, Physical Vapor Deposition(PVD), Atomic Layer Deposition(ALD), Chemical Vapor Deposition(CVD), and reactive ion etching to fabricate the sensors.

work.company: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
work.position: Packaging Engineer - Embedded Package Design of a 100V GaN HEMT Device for EV Applications
work.summary: Designed a GaN HEMT packaging solution that optimized thermal management by 25%, improving electrical performance under high-stress conditions. Conducted electrical and thermal simulations using LTSpice and Ansys Q3D to troubleshoot design flaws and reduce parasitic inductance by 10%. Led the failure analysis testing and validation of the packaging design, including wire bond pull tests, reducing failure rates by 20%.

work.company: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
work.summary: Designed and simulated a two-stage differential amplifier using TSMC 180nm PDK, reducing power consumption by 12%. Optimized transistor sizing to meet stringent specifications, improving overall circuit efficiency by 10%. Conducted post-layout simulations in Cadence Virtuoso, ensuring compliance with industry standards. Analyzed extracted simulations, identifying key areas for optimization, enhancing performance.

Collaborated with an interdisciplinary team of hardware, software, and system engineers to develop a Smart Cluster Management Tool, improving system monitoring accuracy by 30%. Designed and implemented Python and C programs to retrieve real-time data for system performance testing, reducing system downtime by 10%. Conducted system-level testing and debugging, enhancing software stability by 15%.

work.position: Project - Piezo-Tribo Nanogenerator (PTNG) for Powering Wearable Gadgets
work.summary: Developed an energy-harvesting nanogenerator, optimizing material configuration to improve energy conversion efficiency by 30%. Simulated the nanogenerator model using COMSOL Multiphysics, troubleshooting issues and ensuring compliance with design specifications. Presented findings at ICMSMT 2021, demonstrating innovation in renewable energy and showcasing strong documentation, presentation, and communication skills.
